name: Love On The Beach
description:
Love On The Beach
This is the tenth episode of the first series of the robot family series!
The robot family is the name of a series of lives by two robots named Matthew and Isabella
They will continue to have children
 And their families and friends enter the series
In this episode, Matthew proposes to Isabella on the beach
I love this contrast between an industrial being (a robot) and a romantic relationship
And I want to picture it
At the same time as the sun is setting, I have depicted the sun like the moon
And it is rising like the moon
"Start a love with the sunset
Or moonrise
Sunset
End all sorrows and worries
Sometimes the ending is sweet
Sometimes the end is the end of sorrow
And maybe a new beginning and again! "
